FunctionLayer

Class FunctionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FunctionLayer.FunctionManager

  • public class FunctionManager
extends Object
    Author:
    sofieamalielandt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FunctionManager()
      Initializes the instance of DataFacade as db and a newly created CalcualtePackages, CalculateRoof, CalculateShed, CalculateCarport and GenerateDrawing, for further use in methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addMaterial(Material newMaterial)
      A material is inserted in the database if the material object is not null and does not represents the same name as a material from the database.
      String addRoofType(RoofType rooftype)
      A rooftype is inserted in the database if the rooftype object does not represents the same name as a rooftype from the database or if the selected materials to create a rooftype are not already used on an existing rooftype in the database.
      void calcCarport(Carport carport)
      Calculates the materials for a specific carport and checks its measurments
      void calcRoof(Carport carport)
      Calculates the materials for a flat or sloped roof for a specific carport
      void calcShed(Carport carport)
      Calculates the materials for a shed and checks its the measurments
      String deleteMaterial(Material material)
      Deletes a material from database
      String deleteRoofType(RoofType rooftype)
      Removes a specific rooftype from the database
      String drawCarport(Carport carport)
      Generates a drawing of a Carport seen from the front, side and top - the drawing is in SVG format.
      void GDPRCheck(List<Order> orders)
      Retrieves a list of orders and checks the date for each order if the order is older than 3 years, the order is removed in the database.
      List<Material> getAllMaterials()
      Retrieves a list of materials from database
      User getEmployeeByEmail(String email) 
      List<User> getEmployeesAndAdmins() 
      List<RoofType> getFlatRoofs()
      Retrieves a list of RoofType from database and saves the rooftypes which are flat in a new list
      static FunctionManager getInstance()
      Creates and initializes an instance of FunctionManager
      Material getMaterial(int material_id)
      Retrieves a specific material from database
      Order getOrder(int order_id)
      Retrieve a specific order from the database
      List<Order> getOrders()
      Retrieves all orders from the database
      List<Order> getOrdersByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a list of orders from a User with a specific email
      List<RoofType> getRoofs()
      Retrieves a list of RoofType from database
      RoofType getRoofTypeById(int typeId)
      Retrieve a RoofType from the database with a specific id
      List<RoofType> getSlopedRoofs()
      Retrieves a list of RoofType from database and saves the rooftypes which are sloped in a new list
      User getUser(int user_id) 
      void isShipped(Order order)
      Updates an Order with a specific order_id if it is shipped.
      User login(String email, String password)
      Retrieve a User associated with the specific email and password in database
      String newUser(User user)
      The User is inserted into the database, if and only if the User is not null and the User object does not represents the same email as an User from the database.
      String placeOrder(Order order)
      The wanted Carport is inserted in the database, thereafter the order is inserted in the database with the specific carport
      void removeOrder(Order order)
      The Order, carport, roof and possible shed is deleted in the database
      String removeUser(User user)
      The User is deleted in the database, if the User is not null
      String updateCarport(Carport carport, int carport_depth, int carport_width, RoofType rooftype, int roofslope, int shed_width, int shed_depth)
      The Carport's measurments will be updated in the database, if the measurments is not null - a shed can be removed and will in that case be removed from the database, if a shed is wanted a shed will be inserted in the database - when the carport is updated succesfully, the list of parts will reset and calculated again.
      String updateCustomer(User user, String email, String name, String oldpassword, String newpassword, String address, String zipcode, String phone)
      The User (customer) information will be updated in the database, if and only if the User is not null and the User object does not represents the same email as an User from the database.
      String updateEmployee(User user, String email, String name, String address, String zipcode, String phone)
      The User (employee) information will be updated in the database, if and only if the User is not null and the User object does not represents the same email as an User from the database.
      String updateMaterial(Material material, String material_name, String unit, String material_class, double price)
      A material is updated in the database if the material object is not null and does not represents the same name as a material from the database.
      String updatePassword(User user, String oldpassword, String newpassword)
      The password for a specific User will be updated in the database, if and only if the new password is not null and is longer than four digits
      String updateRoofType(RoofType rooftype, String name, Material m1, Material m2)
      A rooftype is updated in the database if the rooftype object does not represents the same name as a rooftype from the database or if the selected materials to create a rooftype are not already used on an existing rooftype in the database.
      void updateSalesPrice(int order_id, double salesprice)
      Updates salesprice in the database
      void updateStatusAndPaid(Order order, Status status, Paid paid)
      Update Status and Paid in the database for a specific Order order

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • newUser

        public String newUser(User user)
               throws DataException
        The User is inserted into the database, if and only if the User is not null and the User object does not represents the same email as an User from the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to insert in database
        Returns:
        a string telling whether the insert is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if insert is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.newUser(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.User)

      • updatePassword

        public String updatePassword(User user,
                             String oldpassword,
                             String newpassword)
                      throws DataException
        The password for a specific User will be updated in the database, if and only if the new password is not null and is longer than four digits
        Parameters:
        user - the User, which password to update in database

        Returns:
        a String telling whether the update is succesful or not

      • placeOrder

        public String placeOrder(Order order)
                  throws DataException
        The wanted Carport is inserted in the database, thereafter the order is inserted in the database with the specific carport
        Parameters:
        order - the Order to insert in database
        Returns:
        a String telling whether the insert is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if insert not possible
        See Also:

      • GDPRCheck

        public void GDPRCheck(List<Order> orders)
               throws ParseException,
                      DataException
        Retrieves a list of orders and checks the date for each order if the order is older than 3 years, the order is removed in the database.
        Parameters:
        orders - a list of the object Order
        Throws:
        ParseException - if parsing a String to Date not possible
        DataException - if remove not possible

      • removeOrder

        public void removeOrder(Order order)
                 throws DataException
        The Order, carport, roof and possible shed is deleted in the database
        Parameters:
        order - the Order to delete in database
        Throws:
        DataException - if delete is not possible

      • updateStatusAndPaid

        public void updateStatusAndPaid(Order order,
                                Status status,
                                Paid paid)
                         throws DataException
        Update Status and Paid in the database for a specific Order order
        Parameters:
        order - - the order, which status and paid, to update in database
        status - - an object of the enum class Status
        paid - - an object of the enum class Paid
        Throws:
        DataException - if update is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.updateStatusAndPaid(int, FunctionLayer.Enum.Status, FunctionLayer.Enum.Paid)

      • updateCarport

        public String updateCarport(Carport carport,
                            int carport_depth,
                            int carport_width,
                            RoofType rooftype,
                            int roofslope,
                            int shed_width,
                            int shed_depth)
                     throws DataException
        The Carport's measurments will be updated in the database, if the measurments is not null - a shed can be removed and will in that case be removed from the database, if a shed is wanted a shed will be inserted in the database - when the carport is updated succesfully, the list of parts will reset and calculated again.
        Parameters:
        carport - the carport to update in database
        carport_depth - an Integer
        carport_width - an Integer
        rooftype - an object of the class RoofType
        roofslope - an Integer
        shed_width - an Integer
        shed_depth - an Integer
        Returns:
        a String telling whether the update is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if insert is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.updateCarport(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport)

      • getRoofs

        public List<RoofType> getRoofs()
                        throws DataException

        Returns:
        a list of objects from the class RoofType
        Throws:
        DataException - if retrieval is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.getRoofs()

      • addRoofType

        public String addRoofType(RoofType rooftype)
                   throws DataException
        A rooftype is inserted in the database if the rooftype object does not represents the same name as a rooftype from the database or if the selected materials to create a rooftype are not already used on an existing rooftype in the database.
        Parameters:
        rooftype - the rooftype to insert in database
        Returns:
        a String telling whether the insert is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if insert is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.addRoofType(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.RoofType)

      • updateRoofType

        public String updateRoofType(RoofType rooftype,
                             String name,
                             Material m1,
                             Material m2)
                      throws DataException
        A rooftype is updated in the database if the rooftype object does not represents the same name as a rooftype from the database or if the selected materials to create a rooftype are not already used on an existing rooftype in the database.
        Parameters:
        rooftype - the rooftype to update in database
        name - a String
        m1 - an object of the class Material
        m2 - an object of the class Material
        Returns:
        a String telling whether the update is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if update is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.updateRoofType(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.RoofType)

      • updateMaterial

        public String updateMaterial(Material material,
                             String material_name,
                             String unit,
                             String material_class,
                             double price)
                      throws DataException
        A material is updated in the database if the material object is not null and does not represents the same name as a material from the database.
        Parameters:
        material - an object to update from the class Material
        material_name - a String
        unit - a String
        material_class - a String
        price - a String
        Returns:
        a String telling whether the update is succesful or not
        Throws:
        DataException - if update is not possible
        See Also:
        DataFacade.updateMaterial(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Material)

      • calcCarport

        public void calcCarport(Carport carport)
                 throws DataException
        Calculates the materials for a specific carport and checks its measurments
        Parameters:
        carport - an object of the class Carport
        Throws:
        DataException - if retrieval of carport is not possible
        See Also:
        CalculateCarport.calcCarport(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport)

      • calcRoof

        public void calcRoof(Carport carport)
              throws DataException
        Calculates the materials for a flat or sloped roof for a specific carport
        Parameters:
        carport - an object of the class Carport
        Throws:
        DataException - if retrieval of carport is not possible
        See Also:
        CalculateRoof.calculateFlatRoof(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport), CalculateRoof.calculatePlatsmo(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport), CalculateRoof.calculateSlopeRoof(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport)

        Parameters:
        carport - an object of the class Carport
        Throws:
        DataException - if retrieval of carport is not possible
        See Also:

      • drawCarport

        public String drawCarport(Carport carport)
        Generates a drawing of a Carport seen from the front, side and top - the drawing is in SVG format.
        Parameters:
        carport - an object of the class Carport, that is showed as a drawing
        Returns:
        SVG format Drawing as a String
        See Also:
        GenerateDrawing.drawCarport(FunctionLayer.HelpingClasses.Carport)
